channel.title: Invoking Ocamlyacc on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Invoking Ocamlyacc on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: Options
item.description: Here is a list of options that can be used with Ocamlyacc: -v: By default, this option generates a file grammar.output. It contains parsing infomation such as a description of the parsing tables and a report on ambiguities in the grammar. -bfname: Change the name of the output files to fname.ml, fname.mli and fname.output.
